title: Voshdya
author: Voshdya
created_time: May 26, 2022, 07:13:37 PMLast edit: May 30, 2022, 10:58:11 PM by Voshdya
content: I sell Linode accounts on a daily basis. A $100 promo is applied on all accounts (given for 60 days of use).Accounts of various countries. Geo includes Europe, South America, Africa and partly Asia.The quality of the accounts is excellent. Unlike many other sellers who register accounts for any garbage like Revolut, Wise, etc., my accounts are registered with plastic normal banks and, accordingly, have a lot of loyalty from Linode.I also create Vultr accounts. Unlike Linode, In ultra I do almost always only on European banks. Since the limits are usually higher on euro stocks than on the stocks of other continents. A promo for $100 or $150 is activated on Vultr accountsIf the services of a guarantor are needed, I agree to sell through himPrice - 6$Payment: Qiwi or any crypto (all coins from Binance)I also sell accounts Atlantic.net - 10$/accountHigh quality accounts are guaranteedFor purchase questions, contact telegram Voshdenok (https://t.me/Voshdenok)
